body_html: This PR doesn't look complete. If you're going to skip running cmake when the Makefile already exists, then you need some way of overriding this heuristic when cmake inevitably fails to recmake itself (even when it should). Is the only way to do that using python setup.py clean?
body_text: This PR doesn't look complete. If you're going to skip running cmake when the Makefile already exists, then you need some way of overriding this heuristic when cmake inevitably fails to recmake itself (even when it should). Is the only way to do that using python setup.py clean?
body: This PR doesn't look complete. If you're going to skip running cmake when the Makefile already exists, then you need some way of overriding this heuristic when cmake inevitably fails to recmake itself (even when it should). Is the only way to do that using `python setup.py clean`?
